entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to properly set umask in TarEntry and ZipFileExtensions #69760
    7.0.0
  • Remove P/invoke marshalling pregeneration from ReadyToRun. #69758
  • In NativeAOT, Null ref return throws NullReferenceException but should be wrapped in a TargetInvocationException #69755
  • [wasm][debugger] Create new tests about debugging DIM #69747
  • [NativeAOT] Update help links for RequiresDynamicCode warnings and error messages #69746
  • [NativeAOT] Nullable<Decimal> does not preserve operators #69745
  • Crossgen2 has been failing to load 'Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native' #69743
  • review SubtleCrypto fallback scenarios #69741
    7.0.0
  • WASM error handling in SubtleCrypto through web worker #69740
    7.0.0
  • Future AOT Work #69739
    Future
  • ProcessName returns truncated 15 char string on MacOS #69726
  • Default Read method of DecimalConverter ignores NumberHandling #69718
  • Duplicate ManagedToUnmanagedTransition and UnmanagedToManagedTransition calls in profiler #69717
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a JsonEncodedText.Value property #69716
    7.0.0
  • [Blazor WASM] AppDomain.CurrentDomain.FirstChanceException event leads to exception after publish #69721
  • Regressions in System.Reflection.Attributes #69734
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Concurrent.AddRemoveFromSameThreads<Int32> #69733
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<Int32> #69732
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers #69730
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray #69728
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in multiple benchmarks after roslyn update #69727
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/21/2022 4:54:11 AM #69725
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/19/2022 4:33:45 PM #69724
  • [LoongArch64] A plan for amending the LoongArch64‘s port #69705
    Future
  • WindowsCryptographicException cannot be serialized #69704
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Socket.Accept with SocketError output parameter #69699

Closed

  • Add latest BenchmarksGame tests to runtime tree #60578
    7.0.0
  • regression on binary-trees regression in 5.0 #60659
    7.0.0
  • Publish Error of Blazor wasm, TFM=.net6+aot, .net 7 sdk installed #69731
  • BackgroundService will not observe exceptions thrown in ExecuteAsync #68165
    Future
  • [DependencyInjection] Attempt to create an override chain is reported as a circular reference #69478
  • System.Net.HttpClient does not support signature algorithm ecdsa-with-sha224 #69485
    7.0.0
  • Failures on Mono Android x64 Release @ Ubuntu.1804.Amd64.Android.29.Open on rolling build of runtime-extra-platforms #69678
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler build fail #69223
  • NativeAOT: Web App that uses "app.MapGet()" causes NullReferenceException during build #68538
    7.0.0
  • Regex.Matches very very slow on Android #68504
  • Add `Utf8JsonReader.ValueIsEscaped` property #45167
    7.0.0
  • SpecialFolder.ApplicationData is blank inside of an Alpine docker container #69449
  • Support non-allocating view on string properties values of JSON in System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader #54410
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enable JsonEncodedText to be initialized with already encoded bytes. #67850
  • [System.Data.Odbc] GetSchemaTable fails with [42000 Interrupted] for x64 ODBC driver #69558
  • The "MonoAOTCompiler" task failed unexpectedly #68633
    7.0.0
  • System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests started to fail on wasm on rolling build runtime-extra-platforms #69707
  • ICU data file builds are non-deterministic #55637
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Merge several version of stream SendAsync #55818
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Hard-coded path to Xcode #59022
    7.0.0
  • The Array.Sort with custom comparer allocates memory #69701
  • Failure in SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits: The server returned an invalid or unrecognized response #69387
    7.0.0
  • Interlocked for nint #69708
  • Aot Compiler need to handle increased RequiresDynamicCode scope #67843
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add onFrameCall evaluation of static members of non-static class #69594
  • Desktop: Tests under "BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWriteEventToListener" failed with "Xunit.Sdk.EqualException" #21569
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow ToCryptographicException to create serializable exceptions #69765
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow span copy for char arrays instead of manual copy loop #69764
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use correct holder for `ThreadLocalModule`. #69762
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix duplicate transition for reverse delegates and expand our profiler tests for transitions to cover this case. #69761
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • WIP: Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Some cleanup on X509Certificate #69754
    area-System.Security
  • Restore internal tools #69753
  • Add MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #69751
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Revert MSVC changes for libunwind #69750
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add Linux Bionic to official build, for runtime packs #69749
    area-Build-mono
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Skip `COMMA`s when creating non-null assertions #69744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix negative scenarios #69742
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono] Fix diamond pattern encountered with static virtual interface methods #69738
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    community-contribution
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Include `include` folder in runtime pack on all Mono platforms #69719
    area-Build-mono
  • Add a build lane for FreeBSD Mono. #69715
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono
  • Fix the reference assembly so C++/CLI can still utilize System.Runtime #69714
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the exception's dispatch by EPC. #69712
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add matrix for libraries tests on coreclr change #69706
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Added `--git_diff` option SPMI asm diffs #69572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Fix tracking for if a type has auto-layout fields for the managed type system. #69451
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Perf][Mono] Add new Mono Mobile Scenarios to Performance Runs #69526
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add integer type discriminator support to System.Text.Json polymorphism #69326
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Disable test with the correct path #69693
  • Enable W^X by default #69672
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Switch from malloc to stackAlloc for bindings invokes #69698
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Avoid generating unusable instantiations #69703
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid try/catch when generating type forwarder metadata #69702
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix DELETE URL in backport workflow #69737
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix CI jobs regression to *not* default to `shouldContinueOnError: true` #69736
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the compiling error for LA. #69711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix handling of hardware exceptions in native code on Unix #69685
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle multiple incoming connection at the beginning of Http3LoopbackConnection use #69453
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Cleanup main.c/main-sgen.c split, unused glib functions, Apple compression etc #69686
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix W^X executable memory releasing on Unix #69697
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disabling test that is hitting out of memory exceptions in some platforms #69692
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Range check cleanups and optimizations; improve assertion messages #69624
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator #68976
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update gcc leg to 12.1.0 #69188
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69687
    area-Single-File
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    area-Single-File
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] retrieve results from browser bench sample #69673
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Switch extra platform coverage from windowsservercore-2004 to windowsservercore-ltsc2019 #69480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fold System.Private.Interop into CoreLib #69508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • Make superpmi.py collect work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Better createdump error messages #69663
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #69668
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69525
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add the repro case for race condition in revisit_written_pages as a GC test case #69496
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix setting of DacpHeapSegmentData::highAllocMark on DAC side. #69670
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support optional client certificates for MsQuicConnection #69603
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove more uses of StringBuilderCache #69683
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #69081
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove destructors #69628
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Compat] add rule that make sure that constant values do not change #25618
  • VisualStudioWorkloads is not source-build compatible #25616
  • Add `-r` to `dotnet watch` #25612
  • NETSDK1060 Error when build in linux #25605

Closed

  • Fix F# pattern matching codegen regression #25614

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25619
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25602
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Fix pack for static web assets in cross-targeting scenarios #25011
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Preview 6 branding #25621
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to make sure enums match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Set the Framework and Runtime options as required for 'dotnet store' #25435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define 'DeploymentResponse' to parse Zip Deploy status response #25600
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1785898 #25599
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • allow references to structs to be stored in fields of ref structs #1147
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Address issues in records feature spec #6157

Merged

  • Update required members spec #6156

Updated

  • Spec out numeric IntPtr #6031
  • Update utf8-string-literals.md based on recent LDM decisions #6154
  • Update static-abstracts-in-interfaces.md based on recent LDM decisions #6153

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VB compiler crashes with `NullReferenceException` in decoding well-known attributes #61492
  • Symbol of closed Generic Attribute does not fill `TypeArguments` with correct symbols #61490
  • Add async `SourceText` APIs #61489
  • Compiler warns about using not-null `string` in `ValueTuple` declared as `string?` in `switch` statement #61487
  • Unhelpful CS0119 error when unable to find a static abstract method to resolve #61486
  • Visual Studio 17.3 doesn't include CS9026 in error list or IDE highlight #61484
  • Emit cgt, likewise clt, for comparisons #61483
  • Inline Diagnostics are being omitted when there's not enough space #61482
  • Add ability to sync namespaces in VS on the folder level #61479
  • xml doc `cref` can't disambiguate types based on visibility like method body can #61478

Closed

  • `CopyRefAssembly` task should log the file copy #61383
    17.3
  • C# Interactive window doesn't show error squiggles when Pull Diagnostics is turned on #61033
    Backlog
  • Fully remove parameter null-checking implementation #61390
    Compiler.Next
  • The completion list for generic constraints has strange inclusions and omissions #30784
    Backlog
  • Investigate using Background Work Indicator for GTD/Source Link #59710
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Improvements to the background compiler component #61497
    Area-IDE
  • Update versions to use most recent LanguageServer changes. #61496
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Remove reflection and call the LanguageServerSnippetExpander directly #61491
    Area-IDE
  • Prepare VB iterators for EnC support #61488
    Area-Compilers
  • Extract checking for generic constraint context to extension method #61485
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Utf8StringLiteral conversion #61481
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add file paths to interactive buffers and documents to support LSP requests #61441
    Area-IDE, Area-Interactive, LSP, Next
  • Disable inheritance margin for interactive documents #61476
    Area-IDE, Area-Interactive, Next
  • Bump LSP protocol version #61494
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Require VS 17.0 in signed build. #61495
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Log additional information from CopyRefAssembly #61384
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Reduce release/64 limit for EndToEndTests.Constraints #61480
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Fix null ref for JS files #61472
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove parameter nullchecking feature #61397
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add missing node state transition #61308
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Generate single OptProf config for compiler vsix #61493
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61460
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61475
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lazily produce semantic models in source generators #61469
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address prototype comments #61436
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

Updated

  • Add tool window #61499
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable CA1822 (make static) #61453
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61381
    Area-IDE
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Update ServiceHub package version #61410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • Make static respect modifier order #61289
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
    Need Design Review

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] pass custom class parameter to page #41828
  • [Blazor] strongly defined page path and also default page path #41827
  • HTTP/2: Consider increasing default window sizes #41825
  • Kestrel does not allow spaces after the request line #41824
    6.0.x
  • `dotnet user-jwts` follow ups #41820
    7.0-preview6
  • Building the ASP.NET Core repository #41819
  • Trying out Blazor Server #41818
  • Quarantine ReaderThrowsResetExceptionOnInvalidBody #41812
  • Add an AddOpenIdConnect extension that accepts generic TOptions : OpenIdConnectOptions #41811

Closed

  • Plz include solution for #37323 also in .Net 6 #41471
  • dotnet watch on macOS throws error looking for exe #41776
    Discussions
  • SPA proxy stop script fails to run due to incorrect line endings #39261
    6.0.x
  • "@microsoft/signalr" JavaScript package should update its vulnerable "eventsource" dependency #41813
  • Angular c# core 6 template fails to run ng serve windows, package.json #38328
    6.0.x
  • Styling is broken in Identity Template in ASP.NET Core 7.0 preview 4 #41814
  • HTTP/3: Remove try/catch around IsSupported property #41042
    7.0-preview4
  • SignalR Error : Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 500 () #41809
  • Expose OnErrorAsync in ErrorBoundary #41784
    Backlog
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #41806
  • Blazor Server Windows Authentication + SignalR Hub on Windows Server 2019/ IIS 10.0 #41661
  • IdentityUser Primary Key #41689
    Discussions
  • Remove Task.Run from DefaultHealthCheckService checking services #41758
  • Blazor Hybrid validation cases #39933
    7.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41826
  • Handle spaces after request line #41823
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Rename GroupRouteBuilder to RouteGroupBuilder #41822
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix line endings for SPA proxy script on MacOS #41821
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Cache Array.Empty<object>() in RequestDelegateFactory #41816
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix line endings for SPA proxy script on MacOS #41817
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Support multiple calls to WithTags in WithOpenApi #41779
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41810
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool #41520
    area-commandlinetools
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • Add logging to M.E.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #41769
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Refactor "Routing/Builder" methods pre conditions #41783
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-gcdump collect: System.Exception: Read past end of stream #2841
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add big-endian support to Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #3090

Merged

  • Use Environment.GetFolderPath to obtain home directory #3087
  • Add error message to WriteDump response #3084
  • Merge main into release/stable #3089

Updated

  • Update SOS to show thread pool work items from new queues #3080
    DO NOT MERGE, 7.0.0
  • Dev/mirogers/kudu console #3083
    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, dotnet-stack
  • SOS fixes for regions #3062

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fire Navigating/Appearing/Disappearing for a popped page prior to the page get disconnected #7457
    6.0.3xx-sr2
  • WinForms BlazorHybrid application fails to run on other machines after being published #7455
  • [Android] internal exceptions on startup (doesn't crash) #7454
  • ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #7453
    6.0.3xx-sr2
  • [Windows/MacOS] Add a Tabbed window support #7451
  • Setting ModalPage background to transparent no longer displays the underlying view #7450
  • Frame Background with Bound Colors causes null exception and invalid frame handler trace #7449
  • Border.Stroke Shape is not fully displayed #7448
  • Migration documentation enhancement suggestion #7446
  • Cannot display alert from modal page on iOS #7444
  • Accessing string resource throws a false FileNotFoundException in Android #7443
  • Getting started tutorial - hot reload is not working #7441
  • EntityFrameworkCore install errors #7436
  • Please update the viewhandler document #7435
  • Page layout is completely messed up in Android after adding too many controls #7434
  • Android Image.Scale produces wrong layout #7432
  • Update .NET MAUI templates to support selecting the target framework version #7429
    6.0.3xx-sr1

Closed

  • Path as content for a ContentView ControlTemplate crashes on all platforms #7181
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Changing image source on Android causes flicker between images #6625
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Using #IF when targeting windows isn't working #7423
  • iOS Linker doesn't work with Grpc.Core #7437
  • Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry after updating VS to version 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7420
  • Label with FontSize="Header" is enormous on Android and tiny on iOS #7428
  • RC1 - EllipseGeometry does not work #6363
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Custom layout base on AbsoluteLayout will repeated measure many times #7060

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix WinUI Modal to work with lack of root panel #7452
    area/modal, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Fix cell size changed on CollectionView #7447
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22229.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22274.2 #7440
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Align the controls used in the different templates #7439
    area/templates 📄
  • Avoid crash with invalid cast using RadioButtonGroup.GroupName with a View #7438
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • More info on templates #7430
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Merged

  • Fix BlazorWebView disposal #7349
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Windows] Fix Shadows sizing issue #7336
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Android] Fixed crash using Path in ControlTemplate ContentView #7412
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, fatal
  • Don't clear old images. Fixes #6625 #7348
    area/image :framed_picture:, control-image, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Revert "[Android] Fix crash removing items in ListView" #7418
    area/ListView
  • Android NamedSize.Header changed from 96 to 14 #7433

Updated

  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs (Android only edition) #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to childrens #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Android] Fix Button CornerRadius issue #7215
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ModelConfiguration - Convention applied despite being overridden #28091
  • dotnet ef Failed to load /snap/dotnet-sdk/168/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/6.0.5/libcoreclr.so (using Ubuntu 22.04 LTS) #28089

Closed

  • Receiving: "System.NotSupportedException : Collection was of a fixed size." when not using a fixed-size collection. #28047
  • SQL Server basic translations for AT TIME ZONE #26971
    7.0.0
  • Add support for AT TIME ZONE #26199
    7.0.0
  • Geometry.Buffer gets evaluated on client side instead of being translated into SQL #23764
  • Problem with many-to-many with composite key on one side needing to rename SQL columns #28055
  • Incorrect SQL Generated #28039
    7.0.0
  • Caching query result for the lifetime of DbContext #27989
  • Set operations: support when placed after client evaluation in projection #16243
  • Environment-specific Data Seeding #28082
  • EF Core 5.0 : Add or remove ValueGeneratedNever in IEntityTypeConfiguration does not change anything when update existing sql server database #28075
  • New to Add-Migration, can't get it to work #28022
  • can provide a method for obtaining query parameters? #28001
  • Many-to-many UsingEntity with custom join object #28074
  • How to load vfs extensions in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite? #27986
  • Cannot bind constructor parameter to the property even though their type and name matches (except in casing) #28088

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Add support for custom aggregate operators #28092
    auto-merge
  • Update some NuGet packages #28090
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
  • Update test for #23303 #28059
    auto-merge
  • Query: Don't add grouping key to projection when Distinct is applied #28072
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Query: Use accurate generic types in group join flattening #28063
    auto-merge
  • add support for System.Text.Json not including LazyLoader #28084
